welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Passy, France! Known for its charming streets, breathtaking views of the Alps, and rich history, we invite you to immerse yourself in all this city has to offer and create unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Annemasse Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Annemasse Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Annemasse Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.
